name: Cimpress plc
description: Cimpress plc is a global leader in mass customization and web-to-print services, enabling small businesses to create and manage personalized marketing and branding materials. Founded in 1995 by Robert Keane, Cimpress operates various well-known brands such as Vistaprint, which specializes in custom printed products including business cards, marketing materials, and promotional items. The company leverages advanced technology, including artificial intelligence and automation, to streamline the design and production processes, ensuring high-quality products at competitive prices. Cimpress focuses on empowering entrepreneurs and small business owners by providing them with the tools and resources needed to establish their brand identity and reach their target audience effectively. With a strong commitment to customer satisfaction, Cimpress continuously innovates to enhance its offerings, including launching new products and improving user experience on its platforms. The company's mission is to democratize access to high-quality marketing solutions, making it easier for businesses of all sizes to stand out in a crowded marketplace.

seo.meta_title: Cimpress plc | Leader in Mass Customization and Web-to-Print Services
seo.meta_description: Discover Cimpress plc, the global leader in mass customization and web-to-print solutions. Empower your brand with personalized marketing materials and enhance your business identity.

faq.question: What services does Cimpress offer?
faq.answer: Cimpress offers custom printing and promotional products, helping businesses create personalized marketing materials.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Cimpress?
faq.answer: Robert Keane is the CEO of Cimpress plc.

faq.question: Where is Cimpress headquartered?
faq.answer: Cimpress is headquartered in Venlo, Netherlands.

faq.question: What is Vistaprint?
faq.answer: Vistaprint is a brand under Cimpress that specializes in custom printed products for small businesses.
